# ========================
# UNITY PROJECT .gitignore
# ========================

# Ignore these big auto-generated Unity folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
UserSettings/
MemoryCaptures/
sysinfo.txt

# IDE / Editor folders
.vscode/
.vs/
*.csproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.user
*.pidb
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# OS files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Optional: ignore built games or exports
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/

# Visual Studio cache
.vs/

# Crash and log files
*.stackdump
*.log

# Backup files
*.bak
*.tmp
